name: Amumu
title: the Sad Mummy
shortBio: Legend claims that Amumu is a lonely and melancholy soul from ancient Shurima, roaming the world in search of a friend. Doomed by an ancient curse to remain alone forever, his touch is death, his affection ruin. Those who claim to have seen him describe a living cadaver, small in stature and wrapped in creeping bandages. Amumu has inspired myths, songs, and folklore told and retold for generationsâ€”such that it is impossible to separate truth from fiction.

skins.name: Pharaoh Amumu
skins.description: Boy-king of the southern wastes, Amumu's mummified body still haunts the halls of his ancient tomb. His mournful sobbing can be heard over the brutal desert winds, luring in unwitting adventurers.

skins.name: Vancouver Amumu
skins.description: The Vancouver Board of Public Safety would like to assure citizens that no cursed mummies have been spotted within the city limits. Cursed mummies are not native to the Vancouver area. Please do not touch cursed mummies, spreading their mummy curse.

skins.name: Emumu
skins.description: When your friends let you down, the best thing to do is start a rock band driven by hard emotions.

skins.name: Re-Gifted Amumu
skins.description: Like decorative soaps or a fifth pair of socks, Amumu has been passed back and forth between disgruntled family members for generations. For some reason nobody seems to want the sobbing, accursed mummy boy.

skins.name: Little Knight Amumu
skins.description: A diminutive knight whose heart is brave and true, Sir Amumu of Shurima wants only to see peace reign the land in his lifetime. Considering that he's an undying, mummified princeling, he'll probably succeed.

skins.name: Sad Robot Amumu
skins.description: What's worse than a robot without a heart? A child without a friend.

skins.name: Infernal Amumu

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

skins.description: When ancient pyromancers unleashed the malevolent Infernals upon the world, they also unintentionally summoned younger, lonelier creatures. A mere spark compared to the fiery monsters now ravaging the land, Amumu seeks only friendshipâ€¦ unwittingly incinerating all those he touches.

skins.name: Hextech Amumu
skins.description: A mechanical boy intended as a playmate for wealthy children, Amumu has been long forgotten in the advent of newer and more advanced Hextech innovations. But a child has feelings, and within his artificial mind something has begun to awaken that will change the history of Hextech forever.

skins.name: Pumpkin Prince Amumu

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.description: A lonely lad and prince of the patch, Amumu watches year after year as his people are decimated by possums and rowdy teenagers.

skins.name: Porcelain Amumu

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2022 Lunar Revel event.

skins.description: Eternally young due to his bond with the Rat Relic, Amumu's innocence belies centuries of existence. He's been lonely in ages past, but no more: Lux is like his big sister, and Kindred is hisâ€¦ Kindred? Companionship hasn't stopped his occasional tantrums, of course, but at least now there's someone to shine his porcelain eyes after a nice cathartic cry.

skins.name: Heartache Amumu

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

skins.description: Dear Amumu, I see you around the halls, and at the battle of the bands. I'm afraid I'm just too shy to ask you to hold hands, I think you're really cool and I'd love to be your friend. I can't wait to finally meet you! Love, Your Secret Friend-mirer 'Til the End

passive.name: Cursed Touch
passive.description: Amumu's basic attacks <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curse</font> his enemies, causing them to take bonus true damage from incoming magic damage.

spells.name: Bandage Toss
spells.description: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Amumu launches a bandage, pulling himself to the first enemy hit, Stunning them for @Effect2Amount@ second, and dealing @TotalDamage@ magic damage.

This Ability has 2 charges.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Despair
spells.description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have their <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curses</font> refreshed.
spells.dynamicDescription: <toggle>Toggle:</toggle> Amumu begins crying, dealing <magicDamage>@BaseDamage@ plus @TotalHealthDamage@% max Health magic damage</magicDamage> to nearby enemies every second and refreshing <keywordMajor>Curse</keywordMajor>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Tantrum
spells.description: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Passive: Amumu takes @DamageReduction@ reduced physical damage. Additionally, when Amumu is hit by an Attack, this Ability's Cooldown is reduced by @Effect3Amount@ seconds.

Active: Amumu throws a tantrum, dealing @TantrumDamage@ magic damage to nearby enemies.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
spells.description: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, applying his <keywordMajor>Curse</keywordMajor>, damaging and stunning them.
spells.dynamicDescription: Amumu flares out his bandages, <status>Stunning</status> for @RDuration@ seconds, dealing <magicDamage>@RCalculatedDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage> and applying <keywordMajor>Curse</keywordMajor>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
